question: Julie think's it would be funny to stop your putt from going in by putting their foot in front of it. *

choices.text: They should get a 2 shot penalty for deflecting a ball in motion on purpose
You have to now play the ball where it is
You have to pick the ball up and play your shot again
It was funny! Just laugh, your put would not have gone in anyway!

explanation: Julie should not mess around on a golf course. They get a 2 shot penalty, and you have to replace your ball to where it was and replay the shot otherwise you will too!
